law.catch_line: Transfer by irrevocable gift or exercise of power of appointment.
law.text: A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to KRS 385.092.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1986.
